text: is the current Chairman and CEO of eAccess and eMobile, a Japanese telecommunication company. On March 24, 2009, he was also appointed as a director to the Telecom Corporation of New Zealand Limited. Semmoto has also served on the Board of Directors for Softbank and the Sega Corporation. Semmoto received his bachelor's degree from Kyoto University and his M.S. and Ph.D. degrees from the University of Florida.Dr. Sachio Semmoto, PhD | Transclick - Realtime language translation of text messaging == References == ==External links== *eAccess千本社長が上場会見、「FTTHが主流になると考えるのは間違い」 (in Japanese) *eAccess web site (in English) *イー・アクセス (Ii akusesu) on the Japanese Wikipedia Category:University of Florida alumni Category:Living people Category:1942 births Category:Japanese businesspeople Category:People from Nara Prefecture Category:Sega people Category:SoftBank people
title: Sachio Semmoto
